mobile.name: zeus god
mobile.long_descr: Zeus sits here on a throne.
mobile.description:
You see before you the greatest of the Olympians.  It seems as if he could
                   |destroy you with a thought.  Every glance penetrates deep into your soul.
                   |You now know what true fear is.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: prometheus
mobile.long_descr: Prometheus is here, playing with a match.
mobile.description:
This mortal risked the wrath of Zeus to give the gift of fire to humans.  He
                   |looks up at you and smiles.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: hermes
mobile.long_descr: Hermes is busy, delivering a message.
mobile.description:
This is the messenger of the Gods.  He wears a winged helm and boots, and
                   |darts from place to place.  He looks very busy, and it seems as if he doesn't
                   |even notice your presence.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil sneak flying
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: poseidon
mobile.long_descr: Poseidon is dining here.
mobile.description:
He is the brother of Zeus himself, chosen to rule the seas.  He must be
                   |visiting Mount Olympus.  He nods at you and motions for you to enter and
                   |have a seat.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: apollo
mobile.long_descr: Apollo is here, playing a tune.
mobile.description:
This jovial God is strumming on a lyre.  He smiles at you and asks you to
                   |join him.  You notice a dangerous looking bow by his side, however, and think
                   |that he knows more than music.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: ares
mobile.long_descr: Ares is here, kicking your ass.
mobile.description:
The God of War is here, studying some maps.  He scowls at you as you enter
                   |and says 'I am very busy.  What do you want?'
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary flying

mobile.name: athena
mobile.long_descr: Athena is relaxing here.
mobile.description:
Zeus' favorite daughter is sitting on a couch eating grapes.  She smiles at
                   |you and invites you to join her.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: hephaestus smith
mobile.long_descr: Hephaestus the Smith is here, crafting a fine weapon.
mobile.description:
This God is the only one who is not physically perfect.  He is lame and very
                   |ugly.  You get the impression that he is kind, however, and would go out of his
                   |way to help you.  He is attended by three golden maidens.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: handmaid golden
mobile.long_descr: A Handmaid of gold is here, assisting the smith.
mobile.description:
As you gaze upon this creation, you realize that she is made from solid
                   |gold.  She seems to be very lifelike as she assists the smith in his work.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: soldier
mobile.long_descr: A soldier is here, assisting Ares.
mobile.description:
This man is waiting on Ares.  Although he does not look very strong, you
                   |realize that Ares would not have any weaklings working for him.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary flying

mobile.name: musician apprentice
mobile.long_descr: A musician is here, learning from Apollo.
mobile.description:
This man has mastered his first profession, and is now studying music from the
                   |immortal Apollo.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary flying

mobile.name: boy serving servant
mobile.long_descr: A servant is here, feeding Athena her grapes.
mobile.description: This boy is truly lucky to be able to serve Athena herself.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary flying

mobile.name: hound dog war
mobile.long_descr: A large hound snarls at you.
mobile.description:
This great beast can barely be called a dog.  It has been bred to cause fear
                   |on the battle field, and you have no doubt that it does its job well.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary flying

mobile.name: Odin
mobile.long_descr: Odin is resting here.
mobile.description:
As you gaze at Odin, you realize how insignificant you truly are.  He towers
                   |over you, and is so intent on his activities that he barely recognizes your
                   |presence.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: grocer greengrocer julius
mobile.long_descr: Julius the Green Grocer stands here.
mobile.description:
This jovial man has devoted his life to selling fruit and other foods to the
                   |inhabitants of this city.  Although he may seem like a wimp, it would be wise
                   |not to underestimate him.  He smiles warmly at you and shows you his selection
                   |of delicious looking foods.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: alchemist
mobile.long_descr: The ancient, wizened Alchemist stands here.
mobile.description:
Skilled in all manner of magic, as well as the ancient art of alchemy, he
                   |stands ready to supply the citizens here (but not you) with all manner of
                   |arcane supplies.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: clive
mobile.long_descr: Clive the Weapons Master is practicing with his bow and axe.
mobile.description:
Clive looks VERY big and VERY tough.  All those years in the army must have
                   |paid off.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: armourer samuel
mobile.long_descr: Samuel the Armourer glares at you.
mobile.description:
Samuel looks just like Clive the Weapons Master: VERY big and VERY tough.
                   |He doesn't like what you've been doing in his city.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: ra sun god
mobile.long_descr: Ra the Egyptian Sun God is resting here.
mobile.description:
Ra is very bright!  It hurts your eyes to look at him, so you can tell little
                   |about his appearance.  What you can tell, however, suggests that he is no one
                   |to be trifled with.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: chimera
mobile.long_descr: A chimera prowls the cell.
mobile.description:
This bizarre creature has three heads - one of a goat, one of a lion, and one
                   |of a dragon.  It growls at you as you enter the cell, then suddenly attacks!
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary flying

mobile.name: hera
mobile.long_descr: Hera is here.
mobile.description:
Hera, the wife of Zeus is here.  She smiles at you as you enter and invites you
                   |to rest and sit for a while.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: roc
mobile.long_descr: A roc is here.
mobile.description:
This is a giant bird.  It looks at you quizzically, then makes a noise and
                   |looks away.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: citizen resident
mobile.long_descr: A citizen of this town is strolling down the street here.
mobile.description: He looks happy and carefree.  He smiles and tips his hat to you.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: pegasus horse
mobile.long_descr: A large horse with wings is here.
mobile.description:
This horse is snow white with large wings.  Although it doesn't look very
                   |threatening, it seems as though it would be dangerous if provoked.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: cook
mobile.long_descr: A cook is here, hard at work.
mobile.description: This man looks as is he has been spending WAY too much time in the kitchen.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying

mobile.name: jailer
mobile.long_descr: The jailer is here, watching for intruders.
mobile.description:
He looks as though he has spent a lot of time underground, guarding the
                   |prisoners.
mobile.affected_by: invisible detect_invis detect_hidden sanctuary protect_evil flying
